## ✍️ Apply here

ATRIUM's Transnational Access (TNA) scheme offers researchers the possibility to apply for a fully funded placement at a number of different partner organisations to access expert knowledge and advice from leading Data Management organisations across Europe. The ADS Training School is one of a number available via the TNA scheme. For a full list please see the list of Host Organisations at the bottom of the [TNA webpages](https://atrium-research.eu/travel-grants/).

::: callout-tip
Applications to the ADS Training School should be made through this [online form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSctI5Dw7VhUmVKQxSj7lPwGWCvEKU3oI5YlRi0Y1MihDKTXGg/viewform)
:::

## Application Process

For more information about eligibility requirements, the information required and Frequently Asked Questions can be found on the [Application pages](https://atrium-research.eu/transnational-access-scheme-application-process-summer-schools).

::: callout-caution
## Important

Only applicants with organisational affiliations **outside of the UK** are eligible to receive funding.
:::

If you are successful in your application you are required to:

-   Provide feedback to the ADS on training school after your visit.

-   Provide ATRIUM with the details of any outputs resulting from the TNA scheme.
